SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.hush.pgp
Interface PgpConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlgorithmFactory, ArmorInputStream, ArmorOutputStream, CanonicalSignedMessage, CommandLinePgp, CompressedDataInputStream, CompressedDataOutputStream, HushEncryptionEngine, HushEncryptionEngineCore, Key, KeyGenerator, KeyInvestigator, KeyManagementServices, LegacyHushmail, LiteralDataInputStream, LiteralDataOutputStream, OnePassSignatureInputStream, OnePassSignatureOutputStream, PacketContentInputStream, PacketContentOutputStream, PacketInputStream, PacketOutputStream, PgpMessageOutputStream, PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream, PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream, PublicKeyInputStream, PublicKeyOutputStream, PublicSubkeyInputStream, PublicSubkeyOutputStream, S2kAlgorithm, SecretKeyInputStream, SecretKeyOutputStream, SecretSubkeyInputStream, SecretSubkeyOutputStream, Signable, Signature, SignatureInputStream, SignatureOutputStream, SymmetricallyEncryptedDataInputStream, SymmetricallyEncryptedDataOutputStream, SymmetricallyEncryptedIntegrityProtectedDataInputStream, SymmetricallyEncryptedIntegrityProtectedDataOutputStream, SymmetricKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream, SymmetricKeyEncryptedSessionKeyOutputStream, TrustInputStream, TrustOutputStream, UserAttribute, UserAttributeInputStream, UserID, UserIDInputStream, UserIDOutputStream
public interface PgpConstants

Constants used extensively are declared and defined in this interface. By implementing it you get access to it directly.
